name: National Museum
description: Explore the rich history and cultural heritage of our region through exhibitions and artifacts.

name: City Park
description: Enjoy walking trails, picnic spots, a playground, and relaxing green space for all ages.

name: Historic Courthouse
description: Visit our beautifully preserved courthouse that played a key role in local governance.

name: Riverwalk Market
description: Shop locally grown produce and handmade goods at the scenic weekend market.

name: Art Gallery
description: View rotating art exhibits from local and international artists in a modern space.

name: Tech Innovation Hub
description: A center for startups, workshops, and co-working spaces driving the future of tech.

name: Botanical Gardens
description: A peaceful retreat featuring exotic plants, water features, and seasonal floral displays.

name: Local Theater
description: Catch live performances and community plays in our historic local theater.
